properties.name: title
properties.comment: Title text of the card, typically largest in size.

properties.name: subTitle
properties.comment: Sub-title text of the card, typically medium in size.

properties.name: superSubTitle
properties.comment: Super sub-title text of the card, typically smallest in size.

properties.name: diameterScaleFactor
properties.comment: Diameter scale of the card (decimal value between 0 and 1).

properties.name: shape
properties.comment: Shape of the card (square or donut).

comment: Panels of varying shapes and sizes that display text and/or images.
name: AthCard

properties.name: digitInfo
properties.comment: Decimal representation options, specified by a string in the following format: `{minIntegerDigits}.{minFractionDigits}-{maxFractionDigits}`.

comment: A directive that adds helpful behavior to input and textarea elements.
name: AthInput

properties.name: selectedIndex
properties.comment: Index of the currently selected tab.

properties.name: readonly selectedIndexChange
properties.comment: Output to enable support for two-way binding on `[(selectedIndex)]`

comment: Just like traditional tabs, only the tabs appear on the side instead of above the content.
name: AthSideTabs

properties.name: update
properties.comment: Event triggered when cell value is updated.

comment: A data table that displays rows of data.
name: AthTable
